au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=10m_central_apx5mm
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5) # Drive detector to short position #sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(9200,0) # Drive guide to g4 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g4) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 5 mm sics.drive('apx', -23) # Drive beamstops up selBs(2) sics.set('beamcenterx', 93.6) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.3)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(41, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(41,0) driveBsz(257)
